biotools.summary: Computer program used for automated construction of genetic maps. It has been developed primarily for large-scale linkage mapping of markers genotyped in the CEPH reference pedigrees. It has been adapted for automated construction of radiation hybrid maps.

bioschemas.name: MultiMap
bioschemas.summary: Computer program used for automated construction of genetic maps. It has been developed primarily for large-scale linkage mapping of markers genotyped in the CEPH reference pedigrees. It has been adapted for automated construction of radiation hybrid maps.
